statements: SELECT * FROM team_reports;
SELECT report_id, team_name, report_title FROM team_reports WHERE team_name = 'Marketing';
SELECT report_id, team_name, report_title, created_at FROM team_reports ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT report_id, team_name, report_title FROM team_reports WHERE report_title LIKE '%Quarterly%';
SELECT report_id, team_name, report_title, report_description FROM team_reports WHERE team_name = 'Sales' ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_reports WHERE team_name = 'Marketing' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT report_title, report_description FROM team_reports WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM team_reports GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY total_reports DESC
SELECT report_id, team_name, report_title, created_at FROM team_reports WHERE team_name IN ('Sales', 'Development')
SELECT report_id, report_title, created_at FROM team_reports WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM team_reports;
SELECT report_id, team_name, created_at FROM team_reports WHERE team_name = 'Marketing';
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM team_reports GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT dashboard_title, widgets FROM team_dashboards WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS total_dashboards FROM team_dashboards GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY total_dashboards DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_reports WHERE team_name = 'Marketing' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT team_name, metrics FROM team_reports WHERE report_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY team_name ASC
SELECT dashboard_title, widgets FROM team_dashboards WHERE dashboard_id < 10 ORDER BY dashboard_id DESC
SELECT * FROM team_reports WHERE metrics LIKE '%growth%' ORDER BY report_id ASC
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM team_reports GROUP BY team_name HAVING total_reports > 2
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE team_id = 5;
SELECT report_name, created_date FROM reports ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM metrics WHERE date_collected = '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, created_by, created_date FROM reports WHERE report_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE team_id = 1 ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE team_id = 2 AND role = 'Manager';
SELECT team_id, COUNT(*) AS total_members FROM team_members GROUP BY team_id;
SELECT report_name, created_date FROM reports WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM teams;
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) FROM teams GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, report_name FROM teams INNER JOIN reports ON teams.team_id = reports.team_id;
SELECT * FROM teams
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM teams WHERE team_name = 'Sales'
SELECT reports.report_name, metrics.metric_name, metrics.metric_value FROM reports JOIN metrics ON reports.report_id = metrics.report_id
SELECT teams.team_name, COUNT(dashboards.dashboard_id) FROM teams LEFT JOIN dashboards ON teams.team_id = dashboards.team_id GROUP BY teams.team_name
SELECT DISTINCT team_name FROM teams ORDER BY team_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Team;
SELECT team_name, team_location FROM Team WHERE team_location='New York';
SELECT member_name, team_name FROM Member JOIN Team ON Member.team_id = Team.team_id;
SELECT report_name, created_date FROM Report ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_description FROM Metric WHERE metric_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Team;
SELECT team_name, team_location FROM Team ORDER BY team_location DESC;
SELECT member_name, team_name FROM Member INNER JOIN Team ON Member.team_id = Team.team_id WHERE Member.member_id > 5;
SELECT report_name, created_date FROM Report WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT dashboard_name, display_type FROM Dashboard WHERE report_id IN (SELECT report_id FROM Report WHERE team_id = 3) ORDER BY dashboard_name ASC;
